greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficient triangle of the numerators of the (n-th convergents to) the continued fraction w/(1 + w/(2 + w/3 + w/...
comment: Equivalence to the binomial formula needs formal proof. This c.f. converges to A052119 = 0.697774657964.. = BesselI(1,2)/BesselI(0,2) for w = 1.
example: The numerator of w/(1+w/(2+w/(3+w/(4+w/5)))) equals 120*w + 36*w^2 + w^3.
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Aug 08 2010
